name: Prosperity Yusheng (4-6 pax)
description: Specially curated Prosperity Yusheng in a colourful medley of 18 ingredients.

name: Bountiful Yusheng (7-10 pax)
description: Lo Hei with your family to a brand new year of abundance & happiness!

name: Fortune Yusheng (11-15 pax)
description: Yusheng laid out in the shape of a dragon to bring maximum fortune!
